teaser: On Capitol Hill today, the House Transportation Subcommittee holds a hearing on autonomous vehicles, or self-driving cars. Across the pond though, the town of Milton Keynes in England is already planning to have a whole fleet by 2015. Plus, the ongoing fight between Apple and Samsung. And, what are the security implications of the botched HealthCare.gov roll out.
title: Marketplace Tech for Tuesday, November 19, 2013
description: On Capitol Hill today, the House Transportation Subcommittee holds a hearing on autonomous vehicles, or self-driving cars. Across the pond though, the town of Milton Keynes in England is already planning to have a whole fleet by 2015. Plus, the ongoing fight between Apple and Samsung. And, what are the security implications of the botched HealthCare.gov roll out.
